https://tmrev.io/movie/315588-Dreamgirls 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jji0voa3xDORDgWXezKC5jdx3Q3.jpg Parallel love stories of three young women in Berlin: Hannah - an unhappy attorney who sexually demeans herself in order to get at least some love and romance, Leni who runs a coffee shop and has just been ditched by her long term boyfriend, and Vivienne who ends up falling in love with a puppy-eyed pasta designer with 21 dogs. Dreamgirls
